MemoryInfobox.description: 'Phoibe descended from the golden fields of Elysium to save her parents. Her pursuit led her to a mysterious place called the Ixion Wheel. There, her past, as well as Kassandra's, awaited.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' - 'The Fate of Atlantis: Torment of Hades'

General_Description: '''A Young Warrior's Ghosts''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: [[Phoibe]] was looking for her parents, and Kassandra decided to come with her.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra and Phoibe traveled towards the [[Ixion Wheel]] in the hopes of finding the girl's parents.
*'''Phoibe:''' ''The last I heard about my parents, they were hiding near the Ixion Wheel.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Hiding? From what?''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''The [[underworld]] is scary. Maybe they're not fighters like us? I could teach them what you taught me.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm sure you could.''
As they approached a village near the Ixion Wheel, they heard a woman cry out for help.
*'''Mortal Woman:''' ''Help us!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Phoibe, stay back!''
Kassandra entered the village and killed the [[Cyclops of Kephallonia|one eyed man]]'s guards. She and Phoibe entered a ruined house and spoke to the woman, the sole survivor of the thugs' raid.
*'''Survivor:''' ''Please! I already told you—go tell the Cyclops the girl isn't here, and neither is her family. Now get back!''
She brandished her knife at Kassandra, albeit unable to stand.
<tabber>
|-|I won't hurt you.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Relax. We're not going to hurt you, but we need to know what happened here.''
|-|Don't threaten me.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''No one threatens me. Put down the blade and start talking.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''Kassandra! Sorry. What she means to say is we're not goingt to hurt you. We just need to know what happened here.''
</tabber>
*'''Survivor:''' ''Those thugs followed the Cyclops of Kephallonia to their graves, and now they follow him in the underworld. He sent them through here looking for a girl.''
Kassandra and Phoibe exchanged glances.
*'''Phoibe:''' ''The man with one eye...''
*'''Survivor:''' ''Have you ever met a girl named Phoibe?''
Kassandra and Phoibe looked at each other once more, before deciding how much information to give the woman.
<tabber>
|-|This is Phoibe.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''This is Phoibe.''
*'''Survivor:''' ''So you are. My dear, I loved your parents as I loved my own. They hid here with me and told tales about the great warrior Phoibe who sailed to [[Elysium]].''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''They called her me warrior?''
*'''Survivor:''' ''When [[Cerberos]] died, they snuck off to find you themselves... But the Cyclops is looking for you, too.''
|-|I've never heard of her.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''We don't know a Phoibe... Why were they looking for the girl?''
*'''Survivor:''' ''I'm not sure. I was a friend to her parents. They used to hide here. They told tales of their daughter, a great warrior who sailed to [[Elysium]].''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''They called her a warrior?''
*'''Survivor:''' ''When [[Cerberos]] died, they snuck off to the golden fields to find her, but now the Cyclops is looking for them all.''
</tabber>
*'''Phoibe:''' ''Excuse us, please.''
Kassandra and Phoibe stepped outside.
*'''Phoibe:''' ''I remember now. The man with one eye is the Cyclops. He forced me to drink the water.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''He must know we stole your [[Chara|eagle]] back and came to retaliate.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''What do we do?''
<tabber>
|-|We find the Cyclops.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The gates to Elysium are open, but you know the Cyclops. He won't stop until he gets what he wants. We have to deal with him.''
|-|We find your parents.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The gates to Elysium are open. That's how your parents got through. I know the way.''
</tabber>
*'''Phoibe:''' ''What about her? She's a friend of my parents. I want to help her.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''She seems like she can fend for herself.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''The [[Keres]] are magic, and they heal people who get hurt in battle. They live close by. I could...''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Phoibe...''
<tabber>
|-|(If said "We find the Cyclops.")=
*'''Phoibe:''' ''I can do this! I'll be quick, then we can fight the Cyclops.''
|-|(If said "We find your parents.")=
*'''Phoibe:''' ''I can do this! I'll be quick, then we'll go to Elysium and find my parents.''
</tabber>
*'''Kassandra:''' ''All right. But don't take too long, or I'm coming after you.''
Phoibe nodded and took off with a start. Kassandra stayed to keep the woman company. However, a great deal of time had passed, and Phoibe had not returned. Kassandra finally decided to go after her.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra and Phoibe found a woman who knew Phoibe's parents. Phoibe left to get aid for the woman while Kassandra stayed with her, but after taking too long to return, Kassandra set out after Phoibe.
